name: Hard Reading Quiz
instructions: Type the reading of the below word in Hiragana!

cards.question: 一揆
cards.meaning: uprising (esp. in Japan since middle ages, e.g. peasant uprising), revolt, insurrection, putsch, riot

cards.question: 一縷
cards.meaning: a thread, a ray or sliver (of hope)

cards.question: 下戸
cards.meaning: someone who can't drink, non-drinker, temperate man

cards.question: 下賤
cards.meaning: low birth, humble origin, lowly, base, vulgar, coarse

cards.question: 与する
cards.meaning: to take part in, to be implicated in, to side with, to support

cards.question: 与る
cards.meaning: to participate in, to take part in, to receive, to enjoy, to be given

cards.question: 乖離
cards.meaning: divergence, alienation, deviation, estrangement, separation, detachment

cards.question: 也
cards.meaning: to be (an affirmation), to be (location), sum of money (used to express an exact sum on a receipt, envelope, certificate, etc.)

cards.question: 云々
cards.meaning: and so on, and so forth, et cetera, and such, and the like, comment, criticism

cards.question: 些か
cards.meaning: a little, a bit, somewhat, slightly, rather

cards.question: 仇
cards.meaning: foe, enemy, rival, resentment, enmity, grudge, harm, injury, rival, opponent, adversary, competitor, enemy (esp. one with which there is longstanding enmity), foe, revenge, spouse
